Sanctions Screening Product.Name: Sanctions List Search
Sanctions Screening Product.Use Cases: Utilizing the SDN List and various other sanctions lists for due diligence and compliance purposes
Sanctions Screening Product.Solutions: Assisting users in utilizing the SDN List and/or the various other sanctions lists

Key Features.Approximate string matching: Identifying possible matches between entered strings and names on the SDN List and other sanctions lists
Key Features.Slider-bar for setting threshold: Allowing users to set a confidence rating for potential matches
Key Features.Detection of misspellings or incorrect t: Returning near or proximate matches based on the confidence rating set by the user
Key Features.Program Code Key: Providing program codes to indicate how a true hit on a returned value should be treated

key_features: High volume screening
Customizable risk-based settings
Automated tasks
Fuzzy logic matching
Accept list function
Date stamp functionality
Streamlining data acquisition processes
Enriching customer and third party data
Handling multiple lists
Batch screening
High quality and comprehensive sanctions data

sanctions_screening_product_1.name: PwC Sanctions Screening
usecases: Identifying potential risks associated with sanctioned or blacklisted business partners
Conducting sanctions and watch lists screening across multiple jurisdictions
sanctions_screening_product_1.solutions: The dedicated forensic team has all the necessary data sources and tools for conducting sanctions and watch lists screening. They engage with trusted external data providers and use algorithms to match the list of third parties provided by the client with the list of sanctioned entities. They also perform manual reviews of identified matches for potential false positives.
key_features: Up to 1000 checks in the Enterprise package
Validity of each package for 365 days from the date of purchase
Integrity Due Diligence
Pre-employment screening
Sanctions screening

key_features.Data Sources: 11,000 independent and reliable data sources from 220+ countries and territories
key_features.Sanctions & Watchlists: Screening against global watchlists and sanctions lists including OFAC, UN, HMT, EU, DFAT, and more
key_features.PEPs Screening: Liveness and Face Match verification for PEPs screening
key_features.Adverse Media Analysis: Monitoring thousands of media sources for negative mentions and aggregating data into customer profiles
key_features.Compliance Coverage: AML screening, User Verification, Business Verification, Transaction Monitoring, and Travel Rule compliance
key_features.Client Testimonial: Positive feedback from Deputy Group Head of Compliance of Capital.com

sanctions_screening_product.solutions: Verafin offers a consolidated Sanctions Screening and Management solution that improves the speed and accuracy of investigations and increases the effectiveness of sanctions compliance programs.

key_features.efficient_customer_onboarding: Scan newly onboarded customers against watch lists to prevent transacting with sanctioned entities.
key_features.transaction_monitoring: Review risk-rated evidence in high-quality alerts created from ongoing customer transaction monitoring.
key_features.automatic_list_updates: Automatically updates sanctioned regions lists and provides list versioning to quickly highlight changes to previous lists.
key_features.continuous_activity_based_manual_screeni: Continuously scan vendors, employees, and all customers for any demographic data changes and changes to monitored lists.
key_features.consolidation_of_solutions: Integrate sanctions compliance program with multiple data sources, screening agents, transaction monitoring, and case management all in one place.
key_features.rich_data_analysis: Generate high-quality alerts through the ongoing analysis of multiple data sources including demographic data, rich wire analysis, and SWIFT codes.
